problem_names:
lemma symmetry1: assumes "symp R" 
shows "\<forall>x y. (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow> (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*"

lemma symmetry2: assumes "\<forall>x y. (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow> (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* "
shows "symp R^**"
lemma symmetry3: assumes "symp R" shows "symp R^**"
lemma symm_trans: assumes "symp R" shows "symp R^++"
translations:
lemma symmetry1: assumes "symp R" 
shows "\<forall>x y. (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow> (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
have  "R x y \<longrightarrow>  R y x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R x y \<longrightarrow> R y x
by (metis assms sympD)

proof (state)
this:
  R x y \<longrightarrow> R y x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  R x y \<longrightarrow> R y x
have " (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y} \<longrightarrow> (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y} \<longrightarrow>
  (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y} \<longrightarrow>
  (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}
have 2:"\<forall> x y. (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y} \<longrightarrow> (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}"
by (metis (full_types) assms mem_Collect_eq split_conv sympE)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>x y.
     (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y} \<longrightarrow>
     (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>x y.
     (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y} \<longrightarrow>
     (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}
have "sym {(x, y). R x y}"
unfolding sym_def
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  sym {(x, y). R x y}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
then
have 3: "sym (rtrancl {(x, y). R x y})"
using sym_rtrancl
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  sym ({(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  sym ({(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  sym ({(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
by (metis symE)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>x y.
     (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
     (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma symmetry2: assumes "\<forall>x y. (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow> (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* "
shows "symp R^**"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. symp R\<^sup>*\<^sup>*
unfolding symp_def Enum.rtranclp_rtrancl_eq assms

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). R x y}\<^sup>*
by (metis assms)
lemma symmetry3: assumes "symp R" shows "symp R^**"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. symp R\<^sup>*\<^sup>*
using assms symmetry1 symmetry2

proof (prove)
using this:
  symp R
  symp ?R \<Longrightarrow>
  \<forall>x y.
     (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). ?R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
     (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). ?R x y}\<^sup>*
  \<forall>x y.
     (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). ?R x y}\<^sup>* \<longrightarrow>
     (y, x) \<in> {(x, y). ?R x y}\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow>
  symp ?R\<^sup>*\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. symp R\<^sup>*\<^sup>*
by metis
lemma symm_trans: assumes "symp R" shows "symp R^++"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. symp R\<^sup>+\<^sup>+
by (metis assms rtranclpD symmetry3 symp_def tranclp_into_rtranclp)
end
